alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 25 at 8:48PM CDT until May 28 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Arkansas River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County. For the Arkansas River...including Great Bend, Hutchinson, Haven, Derby, Mulvane, Oxford, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Arkansas City. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural lands can be expected with bank overflows on west side of river. West Chestnut Avenue west of the river floods, expect road closure. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 11.9 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Arkansas River Arkansas City 11.0 9.0 Wed 8 pm CDT 11.8 11.0 9.4 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
